languages.text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Forceful Strike{/g}) and weapons (for example, thunder hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} property of {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}). The maximum push distance is 5 cells.
languages.original_text: Некоторые {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, такие как Мощный удар {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воина{/g}, и виды оружия, такие как громовые молоты, могут отталкивать цели от персонажа. Цели отталкиваются по прямой. Если отталкиваемая цель сталкивается с препятствием или другим существом, и цель, и то, с чем она столкнулась, получат {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, если такое возможно. Наносимый урон равен (2 × расстояние, которое цель должна была преодолеть в результате отталкивания) вне зависимости от расстояния, которое цель фактически преодолела. Урон от столкновений игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, но может быть уменьшен иными способами, например за счет параметра {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}, который дает {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}тяжелая броня{/g}. Максимальное расстояние отталкивания составляет 5 клеток.

traits.locale_text: Some abilities (for example, a Fighter's Forceful Strike) and weapons (for example, Thunder Hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take damage (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores armour but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the deflection property of heavy armour).

Some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s Forceful Strike) and weapons (for example, thunder hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} property of {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}).

Some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s Forceful Strike) and weapons (for example, thunder hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} property of {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}).

languages.text: Некоторые {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, такие как Отталкивающий удар {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воина{/g}, и виды оружия, такие как громовые молоты, могут отталкивать цели от персонажа. Цели отталкиваются по прямой. Если отталкиваемая цель сталкивается с препятствием или другим существом, и цель, и то, с чем она столкнулась, получат {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, если такое возможно. Наносимый урон равен (2 × расстояние, которое цель должна была преодолеть в результате отталкивания) вне зависимости от расстояния, которое цель фактически преодолела. Урон от столкновений игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, но может быть уменьшен иными способами, например за счет параметра {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}, который дает {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}тяжелая броня{/g}. Максимальное расстояние отталкивания составляет 5 клеток.
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s Forceful Strike) and weapons (for example, thunder hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} property of {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Некоторые способности, такие как Мощный удар бойца, и виды оружия, такие как громовые молоты, могут отталкивать цели от персонажа. Цели отталкиваются по прямой. Если отталкиваемая цель сталкивается с препятствием или другим существом, и цель, и то, с чем она столкнулась, получат урон, если такое возможно. Наносимый урон равен (2 × расстояние, которое цель должна была преодолеть в результате отталкивания) вне зависимости от расстояния, которое цель фактически преодолела. Урон от столкновений игнорирует броню, но может быть уменьшен иными способами, например за счет параметра отражение, который дает тяжелая броня.

Некоторые способности, такие как Мощный удар бойца, и виды оружия, такие как громовые молоты, могут отталкивать цели от персонажа. Цели отталкиваются по прямой. Если отталкиваемая цель сталкивается с препятствием или другим существом, и цель, и то, с чем она столкнулась, получат урон, если такое возможно. Наносимый урон равен (2 × расстояние, которое цель должна была преодолеть в результате отталкивания) вне зависимости от расстояния, которое цель фактически преодолела. Урон от столкновений игнорирует броню, но может быть уменьшен иными способами, например за счет параметра отражение, который дает тяжелая броня.

languages.text: Einige {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} (wie {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Kraftvoller Hieb{/g} eines {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Kriegers{/g}) und Waffen (wie Donnerhämmer) können Gegner vom Charakter wegstoßen. Die Ziele werden in einer direkten Linie vom Charakter zurückgeworfen. Kollidiert das gestoßene Ziel mit einem Hindernis oder einer anderen Kreatur, erleiden beide {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} (sofern dies möglich ist). Der Schaden entspricht (2 × der Distanz, die das Ziel zurückgestoßen werden sollte), unabhängig von der tatsächlich zurückgelegten Distanz. Dieser Schaden ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, kann aber mit anderen Mitteln (wie der {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}-Eigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}schwerer Rüstungen{/g}) reduziert werden. Die maximale Zurückwerfen-Distanz sind 5 Zellen.
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Forceful Strike{/g}) and weapons (for example, thunder hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} property of {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}). The maximum push distance is 5 cells.

traits.locale_text: Einige {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} (z.B. der Kraftvolle Schlag eines Kämpfers) und Waffen (z.B. Energiehämmer) können Ziele vom Charakter wegstoßen. Die Ziele werden in einer direkten Linie vom Charakter weggestoßene. Wenn das weggestoßene Ziel mit einem Hindernis oder einer anderen Kreatur zusammenstößt, erleiden sowohl das weggestoßene Ziel als auch das Ziel, mit dem es zusammenstößt, Schaden (wenn sie überhaupt Schaden nehmen können). Der Schaden ist gleich (2× die Entfernung, die das Ziel hätte zurücklegen sollen), und zwar unabhängig davon, wie weit das Ziel während des Stoßes tatsächlich zurückgelegt hat. Dieser Schaden ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}, kann aber auf andere Weise verringert werden (z. B. durch die Eigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} von {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}Schwere Rüstung{/g}).

languages.text: Certaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, comme le {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Coup de force{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g}, et certaines armes, comme le marteau de tonnerre, peuvent repousser leurs cibles loin du personnage, en ligne droite. Si la cible repoussée entre en collision avec un obstacle ou une autre créature, les deux subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, s'ils peuvent en subir. Le montant de dégâts est égal à (2 × la distance que la cible aurait dû parcourir), quelle que soit la distance parcourue par la cible au moment où elle est repoussée. Ces dégâts ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, mais peuvent être réduits par d'autres moyens, comme la propriété {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}armure lourde{/g}. La distance maximale à laquelle la cible peut être repoussée est de 5 cases.
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Forceful Strike{/g}) and weapons (for example, thunder hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} property of {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}). The maximum push distance is 5 cells.

traits.locale_text: Certaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} (comme la capacité Coup de Force d'un Chasseur) et certaines armes (comme les Marteaux Thunder) peuvent repousser les cibles loin du personnage, en ligne droite. Si la cible repoussée entre en collision avec un obstacle ou une autre créature, les deux subissent des dégâts (s'ils peuvent en subir). Le nombre de points de dégâts est égal à (2 × la distance que la cible aurait dû parcourir) quelle que soit la distance parcourue par la cible au moment où elle est repoussée. Ces dégâts ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} mais peuvent être réduits par d'autres moyens (par exemple, avec la propriété {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}armure lourde{/g}).

languages.text: 某些{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}（如{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}的{g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}强力打击{/g}）与武器（如雷霆锤），可以将目标推开。目标将会沿着直线被推往远离攻击者的方向。 如果被推开的目标与障碍物或其他生物撞在一起，则被推开的目标与撞上的目标都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}（假如被撞上的目标可以受到伤害）。撞击伤害等于（目标本该推动距离的2倍）。无论目标在推动的过程中实际移动了多少格，最终撞击伤害都是这个数值。此伤害会忽略目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，但可以通过其他方式降低（如{g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}重型护甲{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}属性）。 目标最远可以被推开5格。
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Forceful Strike{/g}) and weapons (for example, thunder hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} property of {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}). The maximum push distance is 5 cells.

traits.locale_text: 某些{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}（如战士的强力打击）与武器（如雷霆锤），可以将目标推开。目标将会沿着直线，被推往远离攻击者的方向。 如果被推开的目标与障碍物或其他生物撞在一起，则被推开的目标与撞上的目标都会受到伤害（假如被撞上的目标可以受到伤害）。撞击伤害等于（目标本该推动距离的2倍）。无论目标在推动的过程中实际移动了多少格，最终撞击伤害都是这个数值。此伤害会忽略目标{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}，但可以通过其他方式降低（如{g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}重型护甲{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}属性）。

languages.text: Algunas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} (por ejemplo, el {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Golpe vigoroso{/g} de un {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g}) y armas (por ejemplo, un martillo de trueno) pueden empujar al objetivo, alejándolo del personaje. Los objetivos serán empujados en una línea directa desde el personaje. Si el objetivo empujado choca con un obstáculo u otra criatura, tanto el objetivo empujado como aquello contra lo que colisione sufrirán {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} (suponiendo que puedan recibir daño). El daño es igual a (2 × la distancia que al objetivo le quedaba por recorrer), independientemente de cuánta distancia haya recorrido durante el empujón. Este daño ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} pero se puede reducir por otros medios (por ejemplo, con el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}armadura pesada{/g}). La distancia máxima del empujón es 5 casillas.
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Forceful Strike{/g}) and weapons (for example, thunder hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} property of {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}). The maximum push distance is 5 cells.

traits.locale_text: Algunas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} (por ejemplo, el Golpe vigoroso de un guerrero) y armas (por ejemplo un martillo de trueno) pueden empujar al objetivo, alejándolo del personaje. Los objetivos serán empujados en una línea directa desde el personaje. Si el objetivo empujado choca con un obstáculo u otra criatura, tanto el objetivo empujado como aquello contra lo que colisione sufrirán daños (suponiendo que puedan recibir daño). El daño es igual a (2 × la distancia que al objetivo le quedaba por recorrer), independientemente de cuánta distancia haya recorrido durante el empujón. Este daño ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} pero se puede reducir por otros medios (por ejemplo, con el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}armadura pesada{/g}).

languages.original_text:
Some abilities (for example, fighter's Forceful Strike) and weapons (for example, Thunder Hammers) can push the targets away from the character. The targets of those abilities will be pushed in a direct line away from the character.
Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take damage (if they can take damage at all). The damage equals to 2 multiplied by the distance the target should have travelled, regardless of how much it actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores the armour value of the target but can be reduced by other means (for example, with a Deflection property of Heavy Armour).

languages.text: 一部の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}（例えば{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}の全霊の一撃）および武器（例えばサンダーハンマー）は、ターゲットを突き飛ばしてキャラクターから遠ざけることができる。ターゲットは、キャラクターから一直線に遠くへ突き飛ばされる。 突き飛ばされたターゲットが障害物または他の生物と衝突した場合、突き飛ばされたターゲットと彼らが衝突したターゲットの双方が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける(ダメージを受ける場合)。ダメージは、ターゲットが突き飛ばされて実際にどの程度移動したかに関わらず、(2×ターゲットが移動した距離)となる。ダメージは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を無視するが、ほかの手段(例えば{g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}ヘビーアーマー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g})によって軽減する。 最大突き飛ばし距離は5セル。
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s Forceful Strike) and weapons (for example, thunder hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} property of {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}). The maximum push distance is 5 cells.

traits.locale_text: 一部の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}(例えばファイターの全霊の一撃)およびウェポン(例えばサンダーハンマー)は、ターゲットを突き飛ばしてキャラクターから遠ざけることができる。ターゲットは、キャラクターから一直線に遠くへ突き飛ばされる。 突き飛ばされたターゲットが、障害物または別の生物と衝突した場合、突き飛ばターゲットとそれらの衝突したターゲットの両方がダメージを受けることになる(ダメージを受ける可能性がある場合)。ダメージは、ターゲットが突き飛ばされて実際にどの程度移動したかに関わらず、(2×ターゲットが移動するはずだった距離)となる。ダメージは{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}に左右されないが、ほかの手段(例えば、{g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}ヘビーアーマー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}プロパティ)によって軽減する。

languages.text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s Forceful Strike) and weapons (for example, thunder hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} property of {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}). The maximum distance of any one particular push is 5 cells.

traits.locale_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s Forceful Strike) and weapons (for example, thunder hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} property of {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}). The maximum distance of any one particular push is 5 cells.

languages.text: Bazı {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetler{/g} (örneğin {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}'nın {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Kudretli Darbe{/g}'si) ve silahlar (örneğin gürleyen çekiçler), hedefleri iterek karakterden uzaklaştırabilir. Hedefler karakterden uzağa doğru dosdoğru itilirler. İtilen hedef, bir engelle veya başka bir yaratıkla çarpışırsa hem itilen hedef hem de çarpıştığı nesne veya yaratık {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alır (hasar alabiliyorsa). Hasar, hedefin itiş sırasında gerçekte ne kadar yol kat ettiğine bakılmaksızın (2 × hedefin kat etmesi gereken mesafe) formülüne eşittir. Bu hasar, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhı{/g} yok saysa da başka yollarla azaltılabilir (örneğin {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}ağır zırhın{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} özelliği). Maksimum itiş mesafesi 5 hücredir.
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} (for example, a {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Forceful Strike{/g}) and weapons (for example, thunder hammers) can push targets away from the character. The targets will be pushed in a direct line away from the character. Should the pushed target collide with an obstacle or another creature, both the target that was pushed away and the target they collide with will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (if they can take damage at all). The damage is equal to (2 × the distance the target should have travelled) regardless of how much the target actually travelled during the push. This damage ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} but can be reduced by other means (for example, with the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} property of {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}). The maximum push distance is 5 cells.
